title:
The claim that the airport authority had purchased  paintings worth Rs 28 Crore from AK Antony’s wife is not true. Though the Airport Authority had bought two of Elizabeth Antony’s paintings, it had cost the authority a total of Rs 2.5 lakh. She had also shared the picture of a RTI on her Facebook page in 2016, clarifying that the cost of each painting was Rs 1.25 lakhs, and not Rs 28 crore as the viral social media posts claimed. 

Check the following links to know more
